DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish safety effectiveness coronary stenting Zotarolimus-Eluting stent compare Sirolimus-Eluting stent treatment de novo coronary stenosis patient diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Zotarolimus-Eluting Stent v Sirolimus-Eluting Stent Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , two arm , single blind , randomize multi-center trial 380 patient enrol 24 center Korea . Following angiography , diabetic patient significant diameter stenosis > 50 % visual estimation document myocardial ischemia symptom angina , eligible stenting without exclusion criterion randomize 1:1 : ) Endeavor Resolute stent vs. b ) Cypher select . All patient follow least 1 year . Angiographic follow-up 9-months routinely recommend .
DOC.criteria: Diabetic patient angina document ischemia Patients eligible intracoronary stenting De novo lesion Percent diameter stenosis ≥50 % Reference vessel size ≥ 2.5 mm visual estimation History bleed diathesis coagulopathy Pregnant state Known hypersensitivity contraindication contrast agent heparin Limited lifeexpectancy ( less 1 year ) Acute ST elevation myocardial infarction admission Characteristics lesion Left main disease Instent restenosis Graft vessel Hematological disease ( Neutropenia < 3000/mm3 , Thrombocytopenia < 100,000/mm3 ) Hepatic dysfunction , liver enzyme ( ALT AST ) elevation ≥ 3 time normal Renal dysfunction , creatinine ≥ 2.0mg/dL Contraindication aspirin , clopidogrel cilostazol Left ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % Patients actively participate another drug device investigational study , complete primary endpoint follow period . Noncardiac comorbid condition present life expectancy < 1 year may result protocol noncompliance ( per site investigator 's medical judgment ) .
